title: ES Data Group
text:
The ES Data Group (Environmental Sustainability Data and Systems Boundaries Group) promotes open data practice for the Harper Adams Future Farm for research and teaching activities at Harper Adams University, and beyond.

    
 The ES Data Group supports the research, teaching and Future Farm communities at Harper Adams University
Contact: Ed Harris

title: Activities
text:
2022-12-13 Presentation at the HAU ES sustainability conference
2022-12-08 Field trip to tour Rothamsted Research North Wycke Farm
    
 The ES Data Group supports the research, teaching and Future Farm communities at Harper Adams University

title: Projects
text:
Active projects
 2022 Future Farm data dashboards The Harper Farm Database: a platform and dashboard to showcase best practice for all Farm Data stakeholders
 2022 A Future Farm digital twin
Harper Farm Digital Twin crop system model: towards data-informed future farming with DSSAT and Shiny :: Dashboard example

Completed projects
 2021 The Great Data Users Survey (the Harper Farm Data Mapping Project)
Engage with stakeholders of Harper Farm data (farm management, AgreCalc users, Finance, teaching/students, research) to define essential baseline data requirements and uses. :: Survey summary final report :: Project bid
    
 The ES Data Group supports the research, teaching and Future Farm communities at Harper Adams University
